DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study misoprostol administer orally least effective misoprostol administer vaginally cervical ripen induction labor . The main purpose show oral misoprostol administration non-inferior vaginal misoprostol administration respect time interval misoprostol administration onset active phase labor . The study non-inferiority , prospective randomize control trial compare oral misoprostol give 25 mcg every 2 hour versus vaginal misoprostol give 25 mcg every 4 hour .
